ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( Active_Alert__c = FALSE, Fleet_Loader__c = FALSE, Mobilecast__c = FALSE, Mobilecast_Phone__c = FALSE, Roadnet__c = FALSE, Roadnet_Performance_Dashboard__c = FALSE, Scheduler__c = FALSE, Territory_Planner__c = FALSE)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must identify the Customer's product usage. Please indicate which RTS Products the customer is currently using in the RTS Products Used Section.
